column4: i need help my music from windows that i moved over on a external hard drive wont play on ubuntu
that's a restricted format, you'll need to install support for them :) Check this out: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats#head-6c1adf157cf1aaf47a391922036b3ecc98f01796
no problem, after that .mp3 and other restricted formats should play with all related programs :)
